message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  It's a fair price considering your worth and my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000. It's a compromise that I think is fair for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm prepared to pay $10,500, which is a good middle ground for both of us. Let's make this deal happen!

Bob, I understand that $11,000 is still a bit high for you, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not willing to go all the way to $10,500. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $11,250. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a fair price for both of us.
